summary_md: Norway, in the year 2024, has a high GDP per capita (79,670 USD per person), with a moderate inflation rate (3.15%), and a low unemployment rate (3.97%). The average life expectancy is relatively high (83.11 years), and internet usage is widespread (99.00%). The country's export growth (47.56%) is also significant.

sections.economy_md: Norway's economy is characterized by a high GDP per capita (79,670 USD per person) and a significant export growth (47.56%).
sections.labor_md: The labor market in Norway is marked by a low unemployment rate (3.97%).
sections.digital_md: Internet usage in Norway is widespread (99.00%), indicating a high level of digital connectivity.
sections.health_env_md: The average life expectancy in Norway is relatively high (83.11 years), suggesting a strong health environment.
